explains: n. 得体，乖巧，机敏；鉴赏力

sentences.en: Tact was never Mr. Moore's strength.
sentences.cn: 老练从来不是穆尔先生的长处。

sentences.en: Since both are strong on tact not so strong on the aggressiveness and tend to crave affection.
sentences.cn: 因为他们都很老练，不太有攻击性，也都渴望感情。

sentences.en: Her tact and intuition never failed.
sentences.cn: 她的得体和直觉从不出错。
